lines.text: I sleep... during the day. I am not to be disturbed... during the day.

[Opening lines before main title]
The imagination at times sees the fantastic and the grotesque. that the imagination of man can soar into the stratosphere of fantasy is attested by the...
[main title]
The Return of the Vampire.

[to Tesla]
Master, it's night again... beautiful, dark, silent night with the fog creeping in. Time for you to awaken, Master. Time for you to go out.
[Tesla's hand opens the coffin]
Your eyes look like burning coals. Don't come any nearer. Don't touch me.
Helo me, Master. I am hurt!
What is that to me?

[Entering the graveyard]
Blimey, look at this place!

[Seeing the empty coffin, with a Cockney accent]
Blimey, 'e's 'opped! Lord Love-a-Duck!
You're not my master. You're evil no longer. You must be detroyed.
Your mind is no loger your own. I shall command and you shall obey.
Come Andreas. I must find a new resting place. There you will bring the coffin with my native soil...
[Ominously]
... and then, Andreas, I have other plans!

[to Lady Ainsley]
You're a very brilliant woman, but a foolish one to pit your strength against mine!

[Looking at all the bodies unearthed in the cemetery by the bomb]
Blimey! Look at this! It's getting so it ain't even safe to be dead!

[Offscreen, as Andreas walks in the woods]
Andreas!
[Andreas can't locate the source]
Andreas!

[Suddenly seeing Tesla]
You! You have no power over me! That was ended many years ago! I'm no longer your slave! Dr. Ainsley has cleansed me of all the evil you forced upon me! You can't bring it back! You can't! I won't let you! I won't!
You're a fool, Andreas! A complete, utter fool! Your fate is to be what you are - as mine is to be what I am... your Master!
[In a commanding tone]
Come here1
I won't!
[He moans]

[Commandingly]
Look at me, Andreas!
[There is a closeup of Tesla's eyes]
Look at me!

[after Andreas undergoes a metamorphosis into a werewolf]
Andreas, come here!

[Subserviently]
Master, you have returned.
You're a fool Andreas a complete and utter fool for your fate is to be what you are as mine is to be what I am your MASTER !
You're a fool Andreas a complete and utter for your fate is to be what you are as mine is to be what I am your MASTER !
